Content.Name: Finals Test Information
Content.Title: Finals Test Information
Content.BodyCopy:
Spring 2012
Testing Center Priority Line Schedule (A)

Â 

If your test is scheduled in the Testing Center and you come at the time your class
is scheduled to take the final (see schedule below) you may enter
the Testing Center through the Priority Line
or you may use the Standby Line.
Your test will be checked against this schedule when you enter the Testing Center.

July 19		 Friday,

Classes meet: TR, MTR,
MTRF or MTWR

Instructors with sections meeting any of the following criteria should schedule their final exams in the Testing Center during the final class period, or at another arranged time--but not on the two final exam days:
  • sections with exams that will last longer than 90 minutes
  • sections that begin at 7:15 a.m. or earlier
  • sections that begin at 4:00 p.m. or later
  • sections that meet only one day per week
  • sections that do not fit this schedule
  • sections that may have conflicting exam schedules
